body: Hi Thomas, You can use Honeybee_Set Radiance Materials to set up skylight material without decomposing the zone. Is that what you are looking for? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pX4h1nu50oE1-vhYRDVi1Au8o2OQlS5TUy1OEkD70gRlsSfw-OMM-PF*-ms-nF1W6t6LZvorayQRinzod4sy*CxfWho93jDb/setRadianceMaterial.jpg)
